xml.p: Mon: "Hello, farmer.#$e#I've been gone so long... I feel like a stranger." #!String
Resort_Entering: "Hey, @. Nice to see you." #!String
Resort_Leaving: "Time to head home." #!String
Resort_Shore: "Standing on this beach... I feel a rare sense of peace.$h#$e#The ocean is a very special thing." #!String
Resort_Chair: "This is a great place to bond with the family. I really appreciate you fixing it up." #!String
Resort_Bar: "Just getting some water." #!String
Resort: "The boat ride was fun. I even got to use some of my nautical training to help navigate.$h" #!String
MovieInvitation: "Erm... okay. Thank you. I'll meet you there.$h" #!String

accept_864: "...!$4#$b#...Where did you find this?$4#$b#...$5#$b#This man... We fought together in the war, @. He was like a brother to me. #$b#But... only one of us made it back.$5#$b#He never lost his courage, though. Even in the face of death. A true hero... I'll never forget him.#$b#Thanks for bringing me this... It means a lot to me.#$b#Here, take this. It's been sitting in the back of our cupboard for years, and we've never used it." #!String
reject_865: "Yep... It's been tightly sealed, so the flavor should still be really potent." #!String
Mon4: "I don't know if I'll ever get used to being back home.#$e#The peacefulness of the town feels like a mask. That's probably just me though." #!String
Tue: "Things haven't changed much since I've been gone.#$e#Well, except that you're here." #!String
Tue2: "Things haven't changed much since I've been gone.#$e#Except that we have a new farmer in town.$h" #!String
Wed6: "...I lost a lot of friends in battle.$s#$e#What's sad is that I can't even remember their faces.#$e#..." #!String
Wed: "You've been here a while now, haven't you? Your farm must be thriving." #!String

Thu6: "#$1 Kent1#I've been up since 4 o'clock... sometimes I wonder if I'll ever get back into a normal routine.$k#$e#Sam has really grown up since I left. He's a man now.#$e#I wish I could've been there for him.$s" #!String
Thu: "Are you friends with my son?#$e#You probably know him better than I do...$s" #!String
Thu_inlaw_Sam: "Hey, @. Are you enjoying the married lifestyle?" #!String
Fri: "It looks like a decent day for fishing, doesn't it?" #!String
Sat: "Jodi tells me you've really become a part of this community. I'm glad to hear it." #!String
Sat8: "I have trouble sleeping, so please excuse me if I seem tired.#$e#I'm sure you can understand." #!String
Sun: "I don't know what to do with myself now that I'm back.#$e#I'm used to having more structure in my day." #!String
event_popcorn1: "You keep quiet! Stop trying to turn me against my wife.$u" #!String
event_popcorn2: "...$s#$b#You're absolutely right, @.$s" #!String
event_popcorn3: "Don't lie to me! I hate lies more than anything!$u" #!String
